title: Flowmaster Force II Cat-back Exhaust System - 2015-2016 Ford F-150 3.5L TiVCT  -  817727
description:
Flowmaster Part #817727

Test Vehicle: 2015 Ford F-150 3.5L TiVCT

Application:
2015-2016 Ford F-150 with 2.7L/3.5L EcoBoost, 3.5L TiVCT or 5.0L Engine, All Except Std Cab/Short Bed.

Features:
Flowmaster's Force II Cat-back exhaust system for the 2015-2016 Ford F-150 is perfect for the person looking for a mild exterior sound level while maintaining a moderate interior sound with all of the performance benefits that you would expect from Flowmaster. This bolt on 409S stainless steel system for the 2.7L, 3.5L EcoBoost V6, 3.5L TiVCT V6 and 5.0L V8 engines features 3.00in mandrel bent tubing that flows into a 70 Series muffler and then exits into a 3.00in tailpipe. The system is finished off with a 4.00in double walled stainless steel tip. This system fits all cab and bed configurations except Standard Cab/Short Bed models. The exhaust system is manufactured in the USA and is covered by Flowmaster's Lifetime Limited Warranty. Designed for an easy fit, this system includes all necessary parts and hardware for installation.
